::Zardus::

Zardus shakes his head. "No, the Alliance bots will keep their 
uniqueness. If you wish, scouts could be sent to get you DNA around 
the planet though."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk had been pushing the negotiations her way this long, she 
decided
> to play her hand a little further. She knew that his hand was 
better but the
> secret to the game was keeping a good poker face. "Get me CR 
reports on any
> Alliance member who's DNA might be an asset to the program and 
access to CR
> replication programs. I won't need direct samples if I can get 
replication
> clearance." Veratis had taught her that CR tanks and chambers clone 
material
> to repair injured bots DNA structures, access to the records would 
more than
> triple her sample selection.
